page.description: If the Detail View's 'RowEditStyle' is set to 'RowOnDemand', puts the Detail View into edit mode.

argument.name: field
argument.description: The field in the Detail View to set the focus on for editing.

page.discussion: Focus is set to the specified field (field must be uppercase, with spaces in the fieldname replaced with underbar). This method is equivalent to double clicking on a particular field in the Detail View to edit that field.
